name: nokiadancer
description:
## MOVE TO THE BEAT! ##

+ Every action needs to be done to the beat.

+ Controls:

  - Arrow keys: Move (to the beat!)

   - Space: Attack

   - Shift: Switch weapon. The flail is stronger but harder to use, the shuriken is weaker but will always hit the first enemy in the row

+ About the JAM theme: dying is good, but only if you bring someone down with you. Try to find the hidden mechanic!

+ If playing directly on the browser, make sure to click in the game again after it fully loads, otherwise it won't receive your inputs.

+ About JAM restrictions: the music is purely monophonic, however, sound effects are played on top of it. There's quite a story behind this.. we hope the feel of the game is still close enough to the Nokia 3310 experience!
